title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jun 28 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jun 28 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3: Gwen Berry, hammer thrower and BLM activist disgraces the country by turning her back on the national anthem, holding up BLM T-shirt at the Olympic trials. Psaki says Biden backs Berry. Dan Crenshaw rips Berry. Berry will be rewarded by woke corporations like Kaepernick. Rush explains capitalism. Callers respond to Gwen Berry.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
